testCases.title: Valid Login with Correct Credentials
testCases.description: Verify that a user is successfully logged in using correct username and password.
steps: Enter valid username into the username field.
Enter corresponding valid password into the password field.
Check if user is redirected to homepage and a welcome message appears, confirming successful authentication.

testCases.title: Invalid Login with Incorrect Credentials
testCases.description: Verify that an error message is displayed when incorrect username or password are entered.
steps: Enter invalid username into the username field.
Enter correct password into the password field.

testCases.title: Empty Fields Validation for Login
testCases.description: Ensure that the login form requires both username and password fields.
steps: Navigate to login page without entering any credentials in username or password field.

testCases.title: SQL Injection Attack Test
testCases.description: Test for the system's resistance to SQL injection during login.
steps: Navigate to login page and enter a username containing malicious SQL code like ' OR '1'='1 into the username field.
